metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32823 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the bindata RubyGem before version 2.4.10 there is a potential denial-of-service vulnerability. In affected versions it is very slow for certain classes in BinData to be created. For example BinData::Bit100000, BinData::Bit100001, BinData::Bit100002, BinData::Bit<N>. In combination with <user_input>.constantize there is a potential for a CPU-based DoS. In version 2.4.10 bindata improved the creation time of Bits and Integers.

criterions.comment: ruby-bindata package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
